animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: I am often found in the jungle.
I am the largest land animal.
I use my nose to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to play with string.
I like to drink milk.
I come in many colors.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I'm often called man's best friend. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to chew on bones.
I go for walks with my owner.
I can be trained to do tricks.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: I like to eat bread.
I lay eggs.
I have webbed feet.

animal.question: I roar and am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: I have a mane.
I am a carnivore.
I am a big cat.

animal.question: I hop and carry my babies in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: I am from Australia.
I have strong legs.
I eat eucalyptus leaves.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: My stripes are unique like fingerprints.
I eat grass.
I look like a horse.

animal.question: I slither and hiss, and some of me are venomous. Who am I?

hints.text: I shed my skin.
I eat mice.
Some types of me can be deadly.

animal.question: I build dams and have large teeth. I am an industrious rodent. Who am I?

hints.text: I gnaw on trees.
I live in lodges.
I can hold my breath underwater for a long time.

animal.question: I am a flightless bird that lives in a cold, icy environment and waddle when I walk. Who am I?

hints.text: I love the cold!
My diet consist mostly of fish.
I’m black and white, and stand upright

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I make everything wet! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water.
🌿 I can leave puddles on the ground.
☔ You might need an umbrella when I'm around.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain, sometimes I just drift by. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like something you might see on a farm.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ I can be dark and stormy, or bright and sunny.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the day. I help plants grow, and keep the cold away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 You need sunglasses when you look at me directly.
🌻 I provide energy for plants.
🌡️ I make it warm outside.

weather.question: I come from clouds and fall to the ground. Sometimes I’m gentle, sometimes I pound. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You might need an umbrella when I am falling.
💧 I help plants grow.
🌧️ I can cause floods.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky. I make the world sparkle and blankets for you to lie. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny ice crystals.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🧣 You need to bundle up when I'm around.

weather.question: I am strong and invisible, you can't see me, but you can feel me rustling the leaves in a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can blow your hat off.
🍃 I make kites fly.
🌪️ Sometimes I can be very, very strong.

weather.question: I'm a flash in the sky during a storm, often followed by a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a sudden spark of electricity.
⛈️ I am part of a thunderstorm.
🔊 My brother makes a booming sound.

weather.question: I am the loud noise that follows a flash of light during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I rumble and boom.
⚡ My sibling is a flash of light.
👂 You hear me after you see the lightning.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm with very strong winds, and an eye in the middle. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I form over warm ocean waters.
🏠 People board up their windows when I'm coming.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage near the coast.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after the rain. I have many colors, but I can't be touched. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have the colors of ROYGBIV.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines through raindrops.
🍀 Some say there's a pot of gold at my end, but that's just a legend.
